cause.description:
The International Rescue Committee provides critical assistance to more than 700,000 people uprooted by the brutal ethnic and political violence in Darfur, Sudan.
HTTP://WWW.DELIVERDARFUR.COM
HTTP://MYSPACE.COM/DELIVERDARFURNOW ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ABOUT DELIVER DARFUR: Deliver Darfur is a non-profit organization located in Ft. Collins, Colorado. Our goal is to promote awareness and radical advocacy among students worldwide, while raising donations through unique, sweatshop-free apparel.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Official Website:
http://www.deliverdarfur.com
Facebook Group:
http://colostate.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2241038470
Myspace:
http://myspace.com/deliverdarfurnow
The IRC:
http://www.theirc.org
1. Human Rights are universal regardless of race, religion or political standing.
2. The genocide in Darfur must be stopped immediately.
3. The people of Darfur benefit immensely from our donations, time and awareness.
cause.mission: Promote advocacy and awareness for the genocide effected people of Darfur, Sudan.
cause.name: Deliver Darfur
